properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 2:12PM MST until January 16 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 3
inches, except Lookout Pass, with accumulations of 3 to 5 inches.

* WHERE...Evaro Hill, Highway 200 Thompson Falls to Heron, and
I-90 Lookout Pass to Haugan.

* WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be affected. Patchy blowing snow could
reduce visibility near Lookout Pass.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST THURSDAY
